name: krishna
description: To run the site on localhost, we need to install the required dependencies first for the client and the server. Run the following commands from the root directory to install the dependencies: 1. cd Server 2. npm install 3. cd.. 4. cd web 5. npm install

scripts.start: npm install --prefix Server && npm start --prefix Server
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix web && npm run build --prefix web
